metadata.title: CVE-2017-9804 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache Struts 2.3.7 through 2.3.33 and 2.5 through 2.5.12, if anapplication allows entering a URL in a form field and built-in URLValidatoris used, it is possible to prepare a special URL which will be used tooverload server process when performing validation of the URL.  NOTE: thisvulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for S2-047 /CVE-2017-7672.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
